channel.title: How much would you pay for this account?
channel.description:
My friend quit RS, and gave me his account, so i would like to see how much you would pay for it.
[img]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/Character.png[/img] [img]http://i625.photobucket.com/albums/tt332/zs4yswtf/Character2.png[/img]
Notable quests done:
[ul][li]Dream Mentor[/li] [li]Family Crest[/li] [li]Hero's Quest[/li] [li]Legend's Quest[/li] [li]Lost City[/li] [li]Lunar Diplomacy[/li] [li]Monkey Madness[/li] [li]Nature Spirit[/li] [li]Recipe for Disaster[/li] [li]Tears of Guthix[/li] [li]A Void Dance[/li][/ul]

item.title: How much would you pay for this account?

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Hey man, my offer is legit!

Read full topic

item.description:

[/quote]

Didn’t realize I gave a shit
